resources.string:
• Please carry your college ID card with you. 

 • Cars and bikes will not be allowed to enter campus. So you will be asked to park them at the gate and walk inside. 

 • Registrations start at 10.30AM on Day 1 and 9AM on Day 2 and Day 3. Please be there on time. Kindly take a note of the events under general registration and those under special event registration. 

 • Please respect the college rules and regulations and abide by them. 

 • Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the campus premises. Possession and consumption of alcohol and narcotics and other illegal activities in any form is strictly prohibited. Any violation of the mentioned rules will be reported to your college and the case will be severely dealt with. 

 • If any damage to the college properties is reported, the cost of the damage will be collected. The Organisation will not take responsibility for any form of damage to person or property during the course of Instincts 2017. 

 • In case of any discrepancy, the decision of Instincts team is final. 

 • The college bus can be availed for travel to Instincts 2017. 

 • The college bus routes and MTC bus routes can be found in the website. 

 • For any other queries, please feel free to contact us anytime.

• Accommodation will be provided on a sharing basis. However, large teams or teams from the same college may be put up in the same rooms. 

 • Accommodation is provided on first cum first served basis. 

 • Participant will be charged on 24-hour basis, that is you will be charged from the day of check-in till the day you check out. 

 • Advance booking for accommodation is not available. 

 • ID cards are compulsory. 

 • The accommodation cost is Rs 100 per person. 

 • All members of a team should register for accommodation individually. 

 • Accommodation will be provided on 9th to 11th only. 

 • Girls have to follow the curfew system that prevails in the college strictly (8 pm). 

 • Please make entries in the register kept with the security whenever you move in and out of the allotted room. 

 • It is not advisable to keep valuable items along with the luggage in the room. 

 • Instincts 2017 will not be responsible for any loss or damage of your property.

• CMBT TO KELAMBAKKAM (KLM): 570, 570X (SSNCE, Not very Frequent) Note: Do not board 570S. The destination of 570S is Siruseri/Sipcot and not Kelambakkam. 

 • T NAGAR TO KLM via Saidapet :19B (AC and Non AC), 519(SSNCE), 219A 

 • CENTRAL TO SSNCE: 221H (Not very frequent) 

 • CENTRAL R.S to BROADWAY: 10A,10E,11,11G,120K,15A,15B,15G,15L,17,17A,17B,17C,17D,17E,17G,17K,18A,18E,18F,18K,20A,20N,26,50,52B,52G,52L,53P,54V,5C,60D,60H,64C,71C,71D7F,88M,9M,G17,M51,M88,11,120,15B,15G. 

 • BROADWAY TO KLM: 102(AC and Non AC), 521H (Stops at SSN College of Engineering) 

 • TAMBARAM to SSNCE: 515, 555. 

 • SRP TOOLS TO KELAMBAKKAM: 19P, M19A, 102, 19B, 519(SSNCE), 521H (SSNCE), 568(SSNCE), 221H (SSNCE), 570. 

 • KEELKATALAI to SSNCE via Kovilambakkam, Medavakkam, South Pallikaranai, Sozhinganallur : 552K 

 • AMBATTUR TO KLM via Ampa Skywalk, Loyola, T nagar, Saidapet, Madhyakailash : 219A (Not Very Frequent) 

 • KELAMBAKKAM TO SSN 221H, 515, 521H,522,522K,566,568,568C,587, Share auto towards Thiruporur. 

 • Please Note that buses will not be available after 11 pm
